messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Dog training (was: 2 yr old, what dogs eat)

messages.messageBody:
ABout dogs...

We have a new puppy and have been reading some super books on the subject.

"The Culture Clash", Jean Donaldson..
let me tell you THIS is an amazing and cool book! This book is a good read
even if you don't have a dog.

"The Power of Positive Dog Training", Pat Miller
This gives you a week by week training program and describes positive dog
training.

here is her web site- she also has a e-mail list where she answers
questions!
http://www.peaceablepaws.com/

Karen Pryor has a great web site- http://www.dontshootthedog.com

This has been great fun.

Bronwen
